CustomField.description:
Total Service Fee is the Final cost of a 'Local Pickup and Delivery Services' Product. It is the sum of three different criteria's cost including Service Type Fee, Distance Fee and Ad Hoc Service Fee.
This field is used in the after insert/update trigger(Apt_RateCardKeyTrigger) for Line Item object, to overwrite Apttus' NetPrice field with this field's value as part of pricing customisation for 'Local Pickup and Delivery Services' Product.
CustomField.label: Total Service Fee
